channel.title: HP bar
channel.description: This is my problem; When you attack a npc it shows the hp bars, but when you fight a player in wild, it doesn't show the hp bars. This only happens on Moparscape client, anyone know why? Thanks. I'm using Ddsspeced source

item.title: HP bar

Fix the dupes then duhh??

item.title: HP bar
item.dc:creator: @Old_Dutch Old~Dutch
item.description:
@Old_Dutch wrote:

[quote=“irlegitir, post:1, topic:263363”]This is my problem; When you attack a npc it shows the hp bars, but when you fight a player in wild, it doesn’t show the hp bars.
This only happens on Moparscape client, anyone know why? Thanks.
I’m using Ddsspeced source[/quote]

Get a 317Client Ddsspeced source isnt realy compatible with moparscape client…
Download deltascape’s client it’s a 317Client just type in the ip of your server and it should be fixed.
Download link

files.filefront.com/DeltaScape+v16+clientrar/;11614333;/fileinfo.html

Read full topic
